text:
HPI:
   50F w/ b/l LE weakness & SOB (desats to 45%) -> T7-9 vert body/epidural
   abscess s/p T3-L2 posterior fusion and IVC filter [**5-10**], c/b C.diff, s/p
   L thoracotomy, T6-8 corpectomies, anterior cage C6-C9 [**5-20**].
   Chief complaint:
   bilateral leg weakness, respiratory insufficiency
   PMHx:
   PMH: HTN, DM2, neuropathy, COPD (recent intubation), IgG & IgA
   deficiency, colon ca, MRSA osteomyelitis (MTP joint), PE, anemia, CHF,
   hyperlipid, C.diff colitis
   Pain control (acute pain, chronic pain)
   Assessment:
   -History of multiple back surgeries  with persistent back pain.
   Action:
   -Continues on Dilaudid PCA pump, Clonidine tid, and  Morphine PRN.
   Response:
   -Pt reports good pain contraol. [**2132-2-14**]. pt starting to sleep in naps
   without frequent
   -C/O discomfort  with repositioning.
   Plan:
   -Continue with Dilaudid  PCA,  Clonidine and morphine.
   -Continue to reposition q 2. Aggressive skin care.

info.concept: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease of horses
